price: 48. Waxaa naloo waxyooday in cadaab ku dhici qofkii (Xaqa) beeniya oo ka jeesta.”.
arabic: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā anna al-ʿadhāba ʿalā man kadhaba watawallā
